name: Push-Up Variations
description: Developing upper body strength and endurance through progressive push-up variations.

cards.title: Diamond Push-Ups for Triceps & Chest
cards.description: A close-grip push-up variation that targets the triceps and inner chest.
bulletpoints: Keep hands close together forming a diamond shape
Maintain a straight body line to engage the core
Perform slow and controlled reps to maximize muscle activation

cards.title: Archer Push-Ups for Unilateral Strength
cards.description: A push-up variation focusing on unilateral strength and control.
bulletpoints: Extend one arm while shifting weight towards the bent arm
Increase range of motion progressively to improve mobility
